SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER () ROWNUM , A.BOARD_ID , A.BOARD_TTL , A.BOARD_CN , CASE WHEN USE_YN IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE USE_YN END AS USE_YN , A.REG_EMP_ID , B.EMP_FLNM , A.REG_DT AS DT , DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DT , COUNT(*) OVER () AS TOTAL_ITEMS FROM tester.SAMPLE_BOARD A INNER JOIN tester.EMP B ON A.REG_EMP_ID = B.EMP_ID WHERE 1=1
AND A.BOARD_TTL LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWrd},'%')
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(A.BOARD_CN, '<[^>]*>', '') LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWrd}, '%')
AND ( A.BOARD_TTL LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWrd},'%') OR REGEXP_REPLACE(A.BOARD_CN, '<[^>]*>', '') LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWrd}, '%') )
AND A.REG_DT BETWEEN CONCAT(DATE(#{startDt}), ' ', '00:00:00') AND CONCAT(DATE(#{startDt}), ' ', '23:59:59')
ORDER BY DT DESC

SELECT A.BOARD_ID , A.BOARD_TTL , A.BOARD_CN , A.REG_EMP_ID , B.EMP_FLNM , A.REG_DT AS DT , DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DT , A.ATCHMNFL_ID , C.ATCHMNFL_SN , C.STRG_FILE_NM , C.REAL_FILE_NM , C.FILE_STRG_COURS FROM tester.SAMPLE_BOARD A INNER JOIN tester.EMP B ON A.REG_EMP_ID = B.EMP_ID LEFT JOIN tester.ATCHMNFL C ON A.ATCHMNFL_ID = C.ATCHMNFL_ID WHERE 1=1 AND A.BOARD_ID = #{boardId}

SELECT A.USER_ID , A.USER_EMPNO , A.USER_NM , A.USER_BRDT , A.USER_TELNO , A.USER_EML , DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DT , COUNT(*) OVER () AS TOTAL_ITEMS FROM tester.SAMPLE_USER A WHERE 1=1
AND A.USER_EMPNO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userEmpno},'%')
AND A.USER_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userNm},'%')
SELECT COUNT(1) AS USER_NO FROM tester.SAMPLE_USER A
SELECT A.USER_ID , A.USER_EMPNO , A.USER_NM , A.USER_BRDT , A.USER_TELNO , A.USER_EML , DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DT FROM tester.SAMPLE_USER A WHERE A.USER_ID = #{userId}
